title: Inkan architecture- stone Walls of Saqsa Waman

content.question: The stone Walls of Saqsa Waman at Cusco exemplify Inka architectural conventions in that they

choices.label: incorporate standardized stone blocks assembled in a lattice-like pattern
employ complex vaulting techniques for the creation of spacious interiors
consist of megalithic stone blocks joined without the use of mortar
utilize buttresses to contain the lateral thrust of the reinforcing arches

content.answer: consist of megalithic stone blocks joined without the use of mortar

topic.text: 5.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
